title: Duck And The Diesel Engine
description: Duck, the saddle-tank engine, has appeared earlier in the series, but this is the first time he has had a whole book to himself. As usual, he has fun with the other engines, and a newcomer, the Diesel Engine. Diesel is a troublemaker and soon after his arrival makes Duck unpopular with the other engines.13.1 Domeless Engines13.2 Pop Goes The Diesel13.3 Dirty Work13.4 A Close Shave
author: W. Awdry
